Government Consulting

Dedicated federal division providing AI/ML, data engineering, geospatial analytics, and secure software solutions within Azure Government environments.

What HTS Provides to Government

Our federal consulting services focus on mission-critical capabilities delivered securely.

AI & Machine Learning

  • Explainable AI for decision support systems
  • Classification and forecasting models
  • Mission-aligned model development

Data & Geospatial

  • Geospatial analytics and dashboards
  • Data engineering and pipeline development
  • Secure software delivery (DevSecOps)

Mission Outcomes

Procurement-friendly outcomes that deliver measurable value to federal agencies.

Enhanced mission effectiveness through AI-driven insights

Improved data quality and lineage tracking

Streamlined geospatial analysis and visualization

Accelerated software delivery with DevSecOps practices

Increased operational efficiency and cost savings

Compliance Statement

Headen Tech Solutions (HTS) operates with a public/static website for marketing and information only. No government data is collected or processed on the public site. All sensitive workloads and client data are handled exclusively within our Azure Government environment, which supports FedRAMP High baselines.

Controls are aligned to NIST 800-53 and 800-171 requirements within the Azure Government boundary. Public-facing pages follow Section 508 / WCAG 2.1 AA accessibility practices. For operational access, users authenticate through Entra ID (Azure AD) in Azure Government.

Security Architecture

  • Public website: Static content only, no data processing
  • Sensitive workloads: Azure Government (FedRAMP High)
  • Authentication: Entra ID (Azure AD) in Azure Government
  • Accessibility: WCAG 2.1 AA compliant public pages
